      • getMinimalTextRangeLength

        public int getMinimalTextRangeLength(PsiElement element,
                                     java.lang.CharSequence text,
                                     int cursorOffset)
        Returns minimal selection length for given element. Sometimes the length of word selection should be bounded below. E.g. it is useful in languages that requires prefixes for variable (php, less, etc.). By default this kind of variables will be selected without prefix: @variable, but it make sense to exclude this range from selection list. So if this method returns 9 as a minimal length of selection then first selection range for @variable will be: @variable.
        Parameters:
        element - element at caret
        text - text in editor
        cursorOffset - current caret offset in editor
        Returns:
        minimal selection length for given element
